name: Creaibo
tagline: Create 10x better content that sounds like you, faster
description: Creaibo is an AI-native integrated creation space that supports entire workflow‚Äîfrom initial idea and structured framing to ready-to-use content. Built for original content creators who refuse generic, robotic output, it helps you preserve and scale your unique creativity. Creaibo solves a core problem: significantly boosts creative efficiency and content quality, while maintaining consistent style‚Äîno matter the format, be it blogs, long/short video, or any visual-text posts.

name: Foundire
tagline: First-round interviews on autopilot
description: Stop repeating the same first-round interviews for hiring teams. Foundire helps teams scale hiring with global talent search, resume scoring, and adaptive AI interviews that generate decision-ready scorecards with transcripts. In live interviews, the interview copilot gives real-time prompts, follow-up suggestions, and structured notes ‚Äî all connected in one workflow from sourcing to offers and background checks.

name: wink-cursor
tagline: A lightweight smiley cursor with "winks" on click
description: I built Wink Cursor to bring joyful micro-interactions on click to everyday UI. It's a tiny React component that replaces your cursor with a playful emoji that winks when users click üòâ ‚ú® Why ? Most apps feel serious & transactional. A little delight goes a long way, especially in onboarding, landing pages, and creative projects. üß© What you get ‚Ä¢ lightweight & customizable ‚Ä¢ smooth animation ‚Ä¢ works across your app ‚Ä¢ super easy install ‚Ä¢ zero design effort üé®

name: Notchie
tagline: A teleprompter that lives in your Macbook's notch
description: Mac teleprompter that sits in your MacBook notch ‚Äî right below the camera. Read your script while looking directly at the lens. üéôÔ∏è Voice-synced scrolling ‚Äî text follows your speaking pace. Pause, it waits. Speed up, it keeps pace. üëª Invisible during screen sharing ‚Äî hidden on Zoom, Meet, Teams. They see slides, you see your script. Perfect for sales calls, webinars, recordings, interviews.

name: Imajourn
tagline: We are now on the Apple App Store with multiple new features
description: Imajourn is an interactive simulation sandbox that brings the physics of waves and sound to life. Whether you are an artist, a physics enthusiast, or a meditator, Imajourn offers a mesmerizing playground of light, motion, and geometry. Imajourn has moved from its early open source webapp version (Numatics) to a fully functional App Store app with new name and branding, and many new features: Interactive wave sim, chladni patterns and cymatics, audio reactivity, 3D particle sim, presets and more!

name: Vidcard
tagline: The World's First Video Business Card‚ÄîBe Unforgettable
description: Inspired by the "Atlas" card from Call of Duty, Vidcard is the world's first business card. The Problem: Paper cards get ignored. The Solution: Vidcard plays your video pitch instantly‚Äîgrabbing 100% of attention. Combined with NFC, it tracks exactly who views your profile and what they look at (Data Feedback). üöÄ Specs: HD Video Player, Wireless Charging, NFC Tracking,ultra-thin (<5mm).

name: Trip Replay
tagline: Turn your travels into stunning videos
description: Create beautiful animated travel videos for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts. Visualize your journeys with cinematic map animations. Free, private, and no sign-up required.

name: Inspiration by Mind Dock
tagline: Live AI trends from HuggingFace, ArXiv, GitHub, and more
description: Explore AI like never before! AI Data Map integrates models, news, research, and trends, delivering inspiration directly to you.

name: Running Form Analysis App
tagline: Upload a short side-view clip, get actionable form feedback
description: StrideIQ help runners sanity-check their form from a short side-view video. Upload a 10‚Äì20s clip and it highlights a few common issues It‚Äôs meant to be a quick ‚Äúis this roughly what I think it is?‚Äù tool ‚Äî not a replacement for a coach. Works best with a steady, side-view clip at an easy-to-tempo pace. Privacy note: the current version runs in the browser; your video stays on your device. Try it here: https://fruitfoxlu.github.io/StrideIQ/?lang=en

name: Finbos
tagline: AI powered financial intelligence app
description: Finbos is your intelligent financial advisor that helps you take complete control of your money. Track income and expenses, calculate and manage loans, monitor your net worth, set and achieve financial goals, and receive AI-powered insights for smarter decisions. Build lasting wealth with personalized frugality alerts and comprehensive business planning tools.

name: Versus Space
tagline: decision making gamified with fun
description: Create instant polls with real-time analytics, poll timers, and live viewer tracking. Free voting software for team decisions. Pro analytics for $1 lifetime. No signup is required to vote.

name: Backlinkx.io
tagline: Link Building Using High-Quality Backlink Directories
description: Discover a curated list of high-quality backlinks directories to boost your SEO and drive organic traffic. Find relevant opportunities, build valuable connections, and elevate your online presence with backlinkx.io. 150+ List of backlink directories that will help you grow your business or website.

name: Startment AI
tagline: From Zero to Living Project Knowledge Base with AI
description: Stop overthinking and start building. Startment AI turns your startup ideas into a structured execution plan in minutes. We handle the heavy lifting by generating roadmaps and business docs so you can focus on shipping your MVP. Experience instant roadmap generation, a living project knowledge base, and AI MCP integration to keep your context seamless. With built-in idea validation and a dedicated focus mode, you have everything a solo founder needs to stay productive and launch faster.

name: Kodingo
tagline: Project memory for AI-assisted development
description: Kodingo is a persistent project memory engine for software teams. It preserves code, architectural decisions, and the why behind them across developers, engineers, and project managers ‚Äî even as teams change. Kodingo helps new contributors understand the codebase faster, reduces onboarding time, and ensures critical knowledge is never lost.

name: Rentspan.io
tagline: Portfolio analytics for landlords who think like investors
description: Stop guessing which properties are profitable. RentSpan gives landlords true ROI per unit‚Äînot just rent collected. See actual vs potential income, track vacancy costs, visualize your portfolio on an interactive map, and manage maintenance with drag-and-drop workflows. Built by a software engineer and landlord tired of spreadsheet chaos. üöÄ First 100 users get 2 months free + 60% off year one.

name: AI Virtual Staging
tagline: AI Virtual Staging for Real Estate, in Seconds
description: AI virtual staging for real estate listings. Instantly stage empty rooms with realistic furniture. MLS-ready results in seconds. No subscriptions.

name: Price Equalizer
tagline: Turn downloads into actual purchases.
description: Increase conversions worldwide by optimizing your App Store prices using Purchasing Power Parity. Connect to App Store Connect and get AI-powered price recommendations.

name: Stop DoomScrolling
tagline: Turn your steps into screen time
description: Struggling with screen time? This app helps you break the cycle by turning walking into the key that unlocks your favorite apps and websites. Set the apps or web domains you want to limit, choose how much walking earns you screen time, and let healthier habits build themselves‚Äîstep by step. How It Works ‚Ä¢ Select apps & websites to limit Social media, streaming, games‚Äîchoose what you want to take control of. ‚Ä¢ Earn screen time by walking

name: SaaSBox
tagline: Ultimate toolkit for SaaS Developers
description: SaaSBox is the swiss army knife for SaaS teams who need to move fast without duct-taping together 10 different tools. Get feedback widgets, bug reporting with full console logs, changelogs, support chat, and engagement analytics, using easy embeddable lightweight widgets. Install with copy-paste, customise to match your brand, and connect instantly to Slack, Discord, email. Stop losing users to clunky feedback loops and start building the kind of support experience that retains customers.

name: PrivyDrop
tagline: Open-source & free online p2p file transfer
description: PrivyDrop is an open-source, free, and secure P2P file transfer tool with no size limits, no registration, and support for resumable transfers. Based on WebRTC for end-to-end encryption, its code is transparent and trustworthy. Share text, images, and folders across devices, perfect for team collaboration and private file transfer.
